location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire Residency to John Wedderburn, Accountant General, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is forwarding the quarterly accounts of the Bushire Residency ending 31 July 1824, and explains that the delay in their transmission was a result of the Resident's absence from the Residency.
